item.title: Multi-cluster GitOps with Provisioning
item.description: Multi-cluster GitOps with Provisioning Introduction Validated Patterns are an opinionated GitOps environment that lowers the bar for those creating repeatable and declarative deployments.

item.title: To musthave or to mustonlyhave
item.description: Recently a user reported an issue when using the multicloud-gitops pattern: Namely, after testing changes in a feature branch (adding a helm application), said changes were not appearing on the remote clusters.
